mapper.select: SELECT pd.production_disbursement_seq , wo.work_order_seq , wo.work_order_name , wo.work_order_due_date , pd.production_disbursement_name , pd.production_disbursement_departure_date , pd.production_disbursement_total_quantity , pd.production_disbursement_status , pd.production_disbursement_note , wo.warehouse_seq AS factory_seq , w.warehouse_name AS factory_name , u.user_name FROM tb_production_disbursement pd LEFT JOIN tb_work_order wo ON pd.work_order_seq = wo.work_order_seq LEFT JOIN tb_warehouse w ON wo.warehouse_seq = w.warehouse_seq LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON pd.user_seq =u.user_seq WHERE pd.production_disbursement_seq = #{productionDisbursementSeq}

SELECT pdi.production_disbursement_item_seq , pdi.item_seq , i.item_image_url , i.item_name , i.item_division , iu.item_unit_title , pdi.ingredients_warehouse_seq AS store_seq , w.warehouse_name AS store_name , MIN(ii.item_inventory_expiration_date) AS item_inventory_expiration_date , SUM(pdi.production_disbursement_quantity) AS production_disbursement_quantity , pdi.production_disbursement_note FROM tb_production_disbursement_item pdi LEFT JOIN tb_item i ON pdi.item_seq = i.item_seq LEFT JOIN tb_item_unit iu ON i.item_unit_seq = iu.item_unit_seq LEFT JOIN tb_warehouse w ON pdi.ingredients_warehouse_seq = w.warehouse_seq LEFT JOIN tb_item_inventory ii ON pdi.item_seq = ii.item_seq WHERE pdi.production_disbursement_seq = #{productionDisbursementSeq} GROUP BY pdi.production_disbursement_item_seq, pdi.item_seq
